about_the_game:
Dive into the world of covert operations, where your mission is to protect the President of the United States from deadly threats and cunning conspiracies. As Sam Marshall, a former special forces officer, you take on a challenging journey from training to protecting the president on the world stage and within the walls of the White House. Six intense missions await, filled with dramatic twists, stealth operations, and quick tactical decisions.

Game Features:

  • Highly realistic missions: Navigate through meticulously crafted scenarios — from a diplomatic visit to Beirut to an emergency evacuation during an attack on the White House.

  • Variety of gameplay styles: Operate drones, conduct reconnaissance, use binoculars for long-range surveillance, eliminate enemies stealthily, or engage in combat to protect the president.

  • Intense decision-making moments: Every action has consequences. Keep the president and yourself safe by managing limited resources, coordinating evacuations, and selecting strategically crucial routes.

  • Real-time unfolding events: Public spaces with crowds, tense negotiations, night operations in conflict zones, and sudden attacks — each mission demands flexibility, speed, and strategic thinking.

  • Smart and dynamic NPCs: Interact with allies and local security teams, work in crowded environments, and avoid panic when threats are uncovered.

  • Atmospheric graphics and detailed settings: Move through beautifully crafted, realistic locations, from luxury hotels to the intense environment of the White House.

Are you ready to risk it all to protect the president? Follow Sam’s journey — from routine patrols to the most dangerous mission of his career — to become the last line of defense.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 3200G or Intel Core i3-8100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: An exciting plot with unexpected twists allows players to immerse themselves in a high-stakes world. The combination of action and strategy makes each mission unique and intense. You are not just protecting the president—you are shaping his fate!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Simplified Chinese, Russian
*languages with full audio support
